text: hananim-i gag minjog-e seonjija leul bonaeeo hananim-eul seomgidoe usang eul pihala hayeoss-euni geudeul jung hananimkkeseo indohanja iss-eoss-eumyeo geudeul gaunde banghwanghaneun jado iss-eoss-euni daejiwileul yeohaenghamyeo jinlileul bujeonghaneun ideul-ui malloga eotteohaessneungaleul bola
